content:
The Russian serviceman tells about constant drinking among soldiers and complains about the command of the Russian Federation.

About thisinformsMain Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

According to the occupier, one of the units through drunkenness was captured by the Azov fighters.

-ran from Dron-Kamikadze. Correct, we were rapidly harvested here. X *** And they said all sorts: “There were hooks there, they unpaved, no one left there. Now you are storming. Every x *** and nap **** are p *** purulent. As a result, 8 people were captured by Azov. They were so drunk that they could not be wrapped, even jackalas,—Mel occupant.
title: 8 people “Azovites” were captured. Everyone was drunk in smoke, it is impossible to wake up, even a jackal - a gur of crossings
description: About it reports the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. According to the occupier, ...
author: Army Inform
